novel adversarial learning framework.name: RankGAN
novel adversarial learning framework.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel adversarial learning framework , RankGAN , for generating highquality language descriptions .

train.from sentence: As opposed to performing a binary classification task , we propose to train the ranker to rank the machine - written sentences lower than human - written sentences with respect to a reference sentence which is human-written .

learns.from sentence: RankGAN learns the model from the relative ranking information between the machine - written and the human - written sentences in an adversarial framework .

relax.from sentence: In the proposed RankGAN , we relax the training of the discriminator to a learning - to - rank optimization problem .

proposed.from sentence: Specifically , the proposed new adversarial network consists of two neural network models , a generator and a ranker .

train.from sentence: Accordingly , we train the generator to synthesize sentences which confuse the ranker so that machine - written sentences are ranked higher than human - written sentences in regard to the reference .

During.from sentence: During learning , we adopt the policy gradient technique to overcome the non-differentiable problem .

viewing.from sentence: Consequently , by viewing a set of data samples collectively and evaluating their quality through relative ranking , the discriminator is able to make better assessment of the quality of the samples , which in turn helps the generator to learn better .

suitable for.from sentence: Our method is suitable for language learning in comparison to conventional GANs .
